entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
